code: var categoryInitState=[];var categoryReducer=function categoryReducer(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:categoryInitState;var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case'SET_CATEGORY':{return[].concat(action.payload);}case'CREATE_CATEGORY':{return state.concat(action.payload);}case'EDIT_CATEGORY':{return state.map(function(category){if(category._id===action.payload._id){return Object.assign({},category,action.payload);}else{return Object.assign({},category);}});}default:{return[].concat(state);}}};export default categoryReducer;
